H0.text: Who is reported to have as his epitaph. On the whole I'd rather be in Philadelphia. Mark Twain

H1.text: Who is reported to have as his epitaph. On the whole I'd rather be in Philadelphia. Benjamin Franklin

H2.text: Who is reported to have as his epitaph. On the whole I'd rather be in Philadelphia. Oscar Wilde

H3.text: Who is reported to have as his epitaph. On the whole I'd rather be in Philadelphia. Wc fields

A4.text: The epitaph is a verse from The Ballad of Reading Gaol.
